trans-unit.source: Represents a row within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 내의 행을 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The DetailsViewRow class is used to represent an individual row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: DetailsViewRow 클래스의 개별 행을 나타내는 데 사용 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: Each row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control has a designated row type.
trans-unit.target: 각 행에는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤에 지정 된 행 형식입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the row types that are valid for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서에 대 한 유효한 행 형식을 나열 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|A data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The empty data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: | 행 형식 | 설명 | |--------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤의 데이터 행입니다. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| 빈 데이터 행의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when there are no records to display.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>|A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| To determine the row type of a DetailsViewRow object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 표시할 레코드가 없는 경우 빈 데이터 행 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤에 표시 됩니다. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤의 바닥글 행. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤에 머리글 행입니다. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤의 호출기 행. | 행에 대 한 유형의 DetailsViewRow 개체를 확인 하려면 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: A DetailsViewRow object also has a state associated with it.
trans-unit.target: DetailsViewRow 개체에는 또한 연결 된 상태를 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 상태는 다음 표에 있는 값의 비트 조합 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: |State value|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is an alternate row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is in edit mode.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is in insert mode.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>|The DetailsViewRow object is in its normal (default) state.| To determine the state of a DetailsViewRow object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | 상태 값 | 설명 | |-----------------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>| DetailsViewRow 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤의 대체 행. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>| DetailsViewRow 개체가 편집 모드에 있기. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>| DetailsViewRow 개체 삽입 모드에는. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>| DetailsViewRow 개체는 보통 (기본값) 상태에서입니다. | DetailsViewRow 개체의 상태를 확인 하려면 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control stores all its data rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤의 모든 데이터 행에 저장 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>컬렉션.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of a DetailsViewRow object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 에 DetailsViewRow 개체의 인덱스를 확인 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>수집, 사용 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the individual cells of the DetailsViewRow object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 DetailsViewRow 개체의 개별 셀에 액세스할 수는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.Cells%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a cell contains controls, you can retrieve a control from the cell by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 컨트롤을 검색할 셀에서 수 셀 컨트롤을 포함 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>셀의 컬렉션입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A> method of the cell to find the control, if the control has an <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property specified.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수도 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>셀 컨트롤을 컨트롤에 있는 경우 찾을의 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>지정 된 속성입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.FindControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a field value from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> field column or an automatically generated field column, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A> property of the cell.
trans-unit.target: 필드 값을 검색 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>필드 열 또는 자동으로 생성 되는 필드 열을 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A>셀의 속성입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a field value from other field column types where the field value is bound to a control, first retrieve the control from the appropriate cell and then access the appropriate property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 필드 값 컨트롤에 바인딩되는 다른 필드 열 형식에서 필드 값을 검색 하려면 먼저 해당 셀에서 컨트롤을 검색 하 고 컨트롤의 적절 한 속성에 액세스 합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is possible to use a data-binding expression directly in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> field column without binding the value to a property of a control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >에 직접 데이터 바인딩 식을 사용 하는 것이 불가능 한 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>컨트롤의 속성에 값을 바인딩하지 않고 필드 열.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the field value is automatically placed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> control.
trans-unit.target: 이 경우 필드 값은 자동으로에 배치 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the field value, you must first retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl> control from the appropriate cell and then use its <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 필드 값을 검색 하려면 검색 먼저 해야는 <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>해당 셀에서 컨트롤을 사용 하 여 해당 <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataBoundLiteralControl>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the DetailsViewRow class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 목록이 DetailsViewRow 클래스의 인스턴스에 대 한 초기 속성 값에 대 한 참조는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>생성자.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> 의 새 인스턴스를 초기화 하려면이 생성자를 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> class.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>클래스</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> 의 인스턴스에 대 한 초기 속성 값을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>|The value specified by the `itemIndex` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A>|The value specified by the `rowType` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A>|The value specified by the `rowState` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 초기 값 | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>| 에 지정 된 값은 `itemIndex` 매개 변수입니다. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A>| 에 지정 된 값은 `rowType` 매개 변수입니다. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A>| 에 지정 된 값은 `rowState` 매개 변수입니다. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The index of the row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 행의 인덱스는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>의 컬렉션은 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> 컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"> </xref> 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to pass an event up the page's ASP.NET server control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 페이지의 ASP.NET 서버 컨트롤 계층 구조는 이벤트를 전달할지 여부를 결정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트의 소스입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.EventArgs>이벤트 데이터를 포함 하는.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the event has been canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>이벤트가 취소 되었습니다. 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>의 컬렉션은 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> 컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: Use the RowIndex property to determine the index of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: RowIndex 속성을 사용 하 여의 인덱스를 결정 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A>의 컬렉션은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property applies only to data rows.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >이 속성은 데이터 행에만 적용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 인덱스는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> 에 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>의 컬렉션은 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"> </xref> 컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 상태를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowState property to determine the state of the row.
trans-unit.target: RowState 속성을 사용 하 여 행의 상태를 결정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The state can be a bitwise combination of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 상태는 다음 표에 있는 값의 비트 조합 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: |State value|Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowState.Alternate`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is an alternate row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowState.Edit`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in edit mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Insert`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in insert mode.| |`DataControlRowState.Normal`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object is in its normal (default) state.| This property is commonly used to determine the state of a row before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: | 상태 값 | 설명 | |-----------------|-----------------| | `DataControlRowState.Alternate`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤의 대체 행. | | `DataControlRowState.Edit`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>개체가 편집 모드에 있기. | | `DataControlRowState.Insert`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>개체 삽입 모드에는. | | `DataControlRowState.Normal`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>개체는 보통 (기본값) 상태에서입니다. | 이 속성은 일반적으로 작업을 수행 하기 전에 행의 상태를 확인 하려면 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 비트 조합 된 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row type of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 행의 형식을 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowType property to determine the type of row that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow> object represents.
trans-unit.target: RowType 속성의 형식을 확인을 사용 하 여 행의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>개체가 나타내는.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the valid row type values.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 유효한 행 형식 값을 나열합니다.

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |`DataControlRowType.DataRow`|A data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.EmptyDataRow`|The empty data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: | 행 형식 | 설명 | |--------------|-----------------| | `DataControlRowType.DataRow`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤의 데이터 행입니다. | | `DataControlRowType.EmptyDataRow`| 빈 데이터 행의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control when there are no records to display.| |`DataControlRowType.Footer`|The footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.Header`|The header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| |`DataControlRowType.Pager`|A pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.| This property is commonly used to determine a row's type before performing an operation.
trans-unit.target: 표시할 레코드가 없는 경우 빈 데이터 행 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤에 표시 됩니다. | | `DataControlRowType.Footer`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤의 바닥글 행. | | `DataControlRowType.Header`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤에 머리글 행입니다. | | `DataControlRowType.Pager`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>컨트롤의 호출기 행. | 이 속성은 일반적으로 작업을 수행 하기 전에 행의 형식을 확인 하려면 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 중 하나는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"> </xref> 값입니다.
